analysis.description:
TokenCappedCrowdsale.tokenSold (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol#559) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- hasEnded (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol#601-606)
	- finalization (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol#717-743)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol#85-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol#97-102)

TokenCappedCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol#565-585) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol#579-583)

StampifyTokenSale.finalization has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.mint(member.vault,tokenAmount)) (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol)

StampifyTokenSale.bytesToBytes32 uses assembly (/unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol)
	- /unique_chucks/18/0xf5caa669af1a00a4fec356fec8fdd559c824b3bb.sol
